name: claude-scope
description: Claude Code plugin for session status and analytics

scripts.build: npm run build:tsc && npm run build:bundle
scripts.test: tsx --test tests/e2e/stdin-flow.test.ts tests/integration/cli-flow.integration.test.ts tests/integration/five-widgets.integration.test.ts tests/unit/cli.test.ts tests/unit/types.test.ts tests/unit/core/*.test.ts tests/unit/data/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/*.test.ts tests/unit/widgets/*.test.ts
scripts.test:unit: tsx --test tests/unit/cli.test.ts tests/unit/types.test.ts tests/unit/core/*.test.ts tests/unit/data/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/*.test.ts tests/unit/widgets/*.test.ts
scripts.test:coverage: c8 --reporter=text --reporter=html --exclude='tests/**' --exclude='**/*.test.ts' tsx --test tests/e2e/stdin-flow.test.ts tests/integration/cli-flow.integration.test.ts tests/integration/five-widgets.integration.test.ts tests/unit/cli.test.ts tests/unit/types.test.ts tests/unit/core/*.test.ts tests/unit/data/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/*.test.ts tests/unit/widgets/*.test.ts
scripts.test:snapshot: SNAPSHOT_UPDATE=true tsx --test tests/e2e/stdin-flow.test.ts tests/integration/cli-flow.integration.test.ts tests/integration/five-widgets.integration.test.ts tests/unit/cli.test.ts tests/unit/types.test.ts tests/unit/core/*.test.ts tests/unit/data/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/*.test.ts tests/unit/widgets/*.test.ts
scripts.test:snapshot:verify: tsx --test tests/e2e/stdin-flow.test.ts tests/integration/cli-flow.integration.test.ts tests/integration/five-widgets.integration.test.ts tests/unit/cli.test.ts tests/unit/types.test.ts tests/unit/core/*.test.ts tests/unit/data/*.test.ts tests/unit/utils/*.test.ts tests/unit/widgets/*.test.ts
